page.title: 03Recreation in Long Marton
page.content: A lot of people in our block have out- door hobbies like,fishing,ferreting, shooting,walking,climbing and indoor hobbies like carving,stamp and coin collecting,squash,badminton and swimming. The children in the village go to youth club,Tuesday and Wednesday group.Some are brownies and guides and cubs and scouts. One person in the village has more unusual hobbies.Mr.Johnson who is reb- uilding an Austin Seven 1933. Mr.Johnson has had the car for fif- teen years and has been rebuilding it for five years.He thinks it will take him another two years to finish. Parts are hard to get and so he has had to make some himself.
